M

main(String[]) - Static method in class de.seproject.de.Application
Launch the application.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mouseClicked-listener: a) draw: check which objects should be drawn (RadioButton in Drawing-Group), insert a new point/line/rectangle into database using writeData(String sql, DatabaseConnection db) method of DatabaseConnection!
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mouseDragged-listener, used to get coordinates for the drawing of rectangles and lines, changes necessary control variables
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mouseEntered-listener
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mouseExited-listener
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mouseMoved-listener
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mousePressed-listener, saves coordinates when mouse is pressed, used for the drawing of rectangles, lines as well as the deletion and selection of geometries
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class de.seproject.de.Functionality
mouseReleased-listener, lines/rectangles are inserted into database, selected geometries are stores as string or deleted from database
